name: frugal-nvr
description: A simple, low-resource, locally controlled NVR

scripts.buildUI: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf web && npx parcel build --public-url ./ --dist-dir web ui/index.html
scripts.buildImage: docker build -f build.Dockerfile -t sclaflin/frugal-nvr:`npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g'` .
scripts.buildDevImage: docker build -f build.Dockerfile -t sclaflin/frugal-nvr:`git rev-parse --short HEAD` .
scripts.deployImages: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/amd64 -f build.Dockerfile -t sclaflin/frugal-nvr:`npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g'` -t sclaflin/frugal-nvr:latest . --push
